Picturehouse Membership

Join us and enjoy discounts, priority booking, exclusive previews and more and now receive four free tickets

  • Up to £2 off tickets
  • Invitations to free previews
  • 10% off food and drink
  • Priority booking for special events
  • 20% off all year round / Free drink on sign-up
  • Discounts at local and national businesses

Valid at all Picturehouse Cinemas nationwide
